title: Error: You need to own at least 16 champions to play ranked!
body:
I do own 16 champions. These are all champions I have purchased and not part of a free rotation. This just recently started to happen. Could it have something to do with the patch?

Champions I own:
Alistar, Amumu, Annie, Ashe, Dr. Mundo, Garen, Janna, Kayle, Nunu, Ryze, Singed, Sivir, Soraka, Tristana, Veigar, and Warwick.

Thanks for any insight or help.

replies.body: Ryze is currently disabled due to an issue per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  For this reason your pool isn't being counted as 16.  You may need to grab another champ in the meantime, or wait until this is fixed up.  Hope that helps clear things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EAL3lBNo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-19T22:09:21.297+0000)
>
> Ryze is currently disabled due to an issue per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  For this reason your pool isn't being counted as 16.  You may need to grab another champ in the meantime, or wait until this is fixed up.  Hope that helps clear things up!

I'm having the same error, but I have 93 owned champions.
